document.full_text: lindsay lohan was ordered to stand trial in june for stealing a gold necklace but a judge on friday reduced the charge to a simple misdemeanor, sharply reducing the chances of the actress getting a lengthy jail sentence if convicted.
document.title: lindsay lohan to stand trial in june on jewelry theft
lines_and_colors: lindsay lohan was ordered to stand trial in june for stealing a gold necklace but a judge on friday reduced the charge to a simple misdemeanor, sharply reducing the chances of the actress getting a lengthy jail sentence if convicted.
